articles.description: Follow 5 Live commentary and live text as Monaco host Aston Villa and Liverpool face Lille in the Champions League.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Monaco vs Aston Villa, Liverpool vs Lille - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: Novak Djokovic produces another scarcely-believable comeback to stun Carlos Alcaraz and reach the Australian Open semi-finals.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic beats Carlos Alcaraz in Melbourne semi-finals

articles.description: Alex Hartley says she has been "hung out to dry" and snubbed by England players over her comments about the team's fitness.
articles.title: Alex Hartley given 'cold shoulder' by England over fitness comment

articles.description: Real Madrid striker Kylian Mbappe says a "mentality issue" prevented him from finding his best form earlier this season.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid form 'couldn't get any worse'

articles.description: As Manchester City complete the signing of Palmeiras defender Vitor Reis, BBC Sport looks at who the 18-year-old is and why he has been so in demand.
articles.title: Vitor Reis: Who is new Manchester City defender?

articles.description: England's match against Afghanistan at the Champions Trophy next month should go ahead despite calls for a boycott, says captain Jos Buttler.
articles.title: England v Afghanistan: Boycott not the way to go, says captain Jos Buttler

articles.description: Sports scientist Anton McElhone has worked closely with Ange Postecoglou at Celtic and speaks to BBC Sport about his methods.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Is Tottenham manager's style to blame for injuries?

articles.description: Natasha Jonas is embracing her underdog tag as she prepares to face rival welterweight champion Lauren Price in March.
articles.title: Price v Jonas: Natasha Jonas a happy underdog against Lauren Price

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka survives a scare against Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova to reach the Australian Open semi-finals and continue her bid for a third straight Melbourne title.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka survives scare to beat Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova and reach semi-finals

articles.description: Modern pentathlete Kate French, who won Olympic gold at the Tokyo Games in 2021, announces her retirement from the sport.
articles.title: Kate French: Former Olympic gold medal-winning modern pentathlete retires
